summary: An ordinance relating to and providing for the improvement of 46th Avenue South and 47th Avenue South, each from Genesee Street to Bradford Street, and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues, by constructing concrete sidewalks, and otherwise improving the same; all in accordance with Resolution No. 9107 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local made by special assessment upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment in Bonds".
